long_description: A big, bad, multi-sport gear basket--plain and simple! Universal mounting hardware fits round and square cross bars and many factory racks. Yakima accessories can be mounted directly to the basket. Wind-deflecting and noise-reducing custom fairing included. Weather-resistant, heavy-duty steel construction. MegaWarrior 22" Extension (sold separately) creates even more carrying capacity. Yakima's Fit List provides complete rack fitting guidelines based on your vehicle's year, make and model.
short_description: A big, bad, multi-sport gear basket--plain and simple!
